name: TelemundoDeportes
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Telemundo Deportes update brings you a recap of the sports news of the day. Add the Telemundo Deportes Update to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account. After adding the Telemundo Deportes Update, you can say “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest update play in Spanish.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
